verbs.description: A trove of thousands of [ARG0: Russian] - [V: backed] [ARG1: Facebook ads] , being made public for the first time , shows that Russia ’s main goal was provoking discontent in the U.S. , leading to and continuing beyond Donald Trump ’s election in 2016 .
